ticket.title: Merge scripts/config used to set up official Rails CI servers
ticket.original-body: These are the scripts I use to set up the official rails CI servers. They are still evolving, and I want to rewrite them all to use Chef, but I'd like to get them committed from my branch so I don't have to keep merging. Some of them are useful for setting up the build environment too, such as setup_rails_dependencies.rb.
